Hi,

I would rather suggest you to try out JFunc, that really is powerfull 
with JUnit when playing with
testsuites and scenarios

J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

>wan_ho_2004 wrote:
>
>  
>
>>I have a working scenario contained in a class that defines its own
>>suite and uses TestSetup to wrap the suite. Can I include that
>>class/suite in other suites?
>>    
>>
>
>Yes. TestSetup implements Test, so you can pass your TestSetup to 
>TestSuite.addTest().
>  
>
